item.title: THCon21 - Rsa internal attacker
item.description: THCon21 - Blacklisted Go back to write-ups list Category: Cryptography Creator: Nico Description: I’ve found this rsa implementation, it is quite strange. I have a public/private key and I’ve also intercepted a ciphertext but infortunately it was not for me, so I can’t read it.
